obj_elevatorcontroller_slash_Step_0_gml_: \EB* Tudo bem^1, este elevador vai nos tirar daqui./%
* Agora^1, pode levar um tempo^1, entao.../%
\E0* Fiquem confortados^1, pessoal!/%
* ... Hey^1. Ralsei^1./
* Voce sabe o pai do Lancer..^1. O Rei?/
* Quando encontrarmos ele..^1. Voce acha que teremos que.../
\EC* ... machucar ele?/
* Susie...?/
\E7* Quero dizer, Eu poderia facilmente esmagar ele^1, mas.../
\E0* Voces^1, Eu sei que essa nao e a coisa de voces./
\E2* Voces tao mais pra^1, uh^1, rastejando como perdedores./%
\E0* E eu estava pensando se.^1. talvez.../
\E6* Eu poderia..^1. fazer isso tambem?/
* Susie!^1? Voce quer dizer tentar AGIR...?/
* Uh, bem,/
* Susie..^1. Ficariamos felizes se voce AGISSE com a gente!/
\E0* E nao se preocupe^1, vamos estar aqui pra te ajudar!/
\E6* Voce nao tera que descobrir sozinha./
\EC* ... ta^1, tudo bem./%
\E0* Hey^1. Ralsei./
* Susie?/
* Voce uh.../
\E6* Ainda vai fazer^1, uh^1, esses bolos...?/
* Bem^1, voce vai parar de me zoar?/
\E2* Bem^1, se EU TIVER^1, Eu acho./
* Entao eu faco quantos bolos voce quiser^1, tudo bem?/
* Yeah^1, como se voce conseguisse fazer tantos^1, cara./%
\E0* Bem^1, esse e o nosso andar!/%
\E0* Hey, Kris^1. Espera um segundo./%
* Ce sabe^1, Estou comecando a perceber./
* Seria mais facil pra gente.../
* Se nos^1, uh^1,ficarmos "mais juntos" um pouco mais./
* Entao, proxima vez que lutarmos com um inimigo.../%
\EC* Se voce me falar o que dizer... Eu te escutarei./%
\E1* ... mas, ce sabe, nao me fale NADA ESTUPIDO,/
\E2* Ou eu voltarei a esmagar cabecas, certo!?/%
\E0* Kris.../
\EC* Estou contando com voce^1, OK?/%
* (Susie realmente se juntou ao grupo.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2689_0: * BOO HOO^1, BOO HOO^1, UEE HEE HEE./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2691_0: * MAS OLHE^1, TRES VISITANTES LA FORA?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2694_0: * Bom te conhecer^1! Sou Ralsei^1, essa e a Kris^1, e.../
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2696_0: * Entao^1, que infernos voce faz ai dentro?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2698_0: \TJ* SOU INOCENTE^1, INOCENTE^1.&* SO QUERIA JOGAR UM JOGO^1, JOGO./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2699_0: * MAS OS REIS CHATOS ACHARAM DIVERTIDOS ME PRENDEREM./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2700_0: * COMO PUNICAO^1, ELES PRENDERAM O MEU CORPO./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2701_0: * MAS EU SOU RAPIDO^1, RAPIDO^1, ESPERTO^1, ESPERTO./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2702_0: * ELES NAO ME PEGARAM^1, E CANSARAM DE CORRER,/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2703_0: * CONSTRUIR UMA PRISAO AO REDOR DO MUNDO^1. AGORA SOU O UNICO LIVRE./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2705_0: * Huh^1? Livre^1? Mas voce esta atras das grades.../
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2707_0: \TJ* AS COISAS NAO PARECEM AQUI^1, LIGHTNERS!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2709_0: * Bem^1, parece que voce nao precisa de ajuda^1, entao./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2711_0: \TJ* ISSO E TAO-^1.&* EU CRESCO SOZINHO NA MINHA PEQUENA LIBERDADE./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2712_0: * ENTAO^1, VOCE VAI JOGAR UM JOGO COMIGO^1, COMIGO...?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2713_0: * EU VOU TE MOSTRAR O QUE E SER LIVRE!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2718_0: * ACHE A CHAVE^1, E EU TE DEIXAREI SER LIVRE^1, LIVRE./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2731_0: * ACHE A CHAVE^1, E EU TE DEIXAREI SER LIVRE^1, LIVRE./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2719_0: * A CHAVE ESTA ESCONDIDA PELOS OLHOS^1. O VELHO LOJISTA SABE UM SEGREDO./%

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2737_0: * BOO HOO^1, BOO HOO^1, UEE HEE HEE!!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2738_0: * COMO VOCE PODE RECUSAR^1, QUANDO VOCE JA ESTA JOGANDO...?/%

obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_358_0: \E0* Eu sou o duque dos puzzles^1, Rouxls Kaard./
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_359_0: \E4* Meus hobbies sao caligrafia^1, cortar grama^1, cuidar de insetos^1, cadeias.../

obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_380_0: \E6* Rouxls esta SEMPRE no lado dos vencedores!^1! Pode apostar nisso!!!/%
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_386_0: \E6* O nosso REI e bem cruel!/
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_387_0: \E2* Enfim^1, ele tambem e brilhante^1, porque ele decidiu EU^1, como duque dos Puzzles,/
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_388_0: \E6* Depois todo mundo foi demitido ou colocado dentro das celas./

obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_394_0: \E3* Eu apenas previ^1, talvez..^1. Se eu aceitasse o cargo mais alto dele.../
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_395_0: \E5* Eu poderia ajudar-lo a derrubar-lo do interior!/
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_396_0: \E6* ... Que!^1? Voce nao pode ter concebido o meu plano!?/%

obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_404_0: \E3* E me chama como seu "Pai menor."/

obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_406_0: \E6* Eu nao quero ouvir seu MP3^1! Prefiro o bom som da MORTE!/
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_408_0: \E2* Como esta ele^1, de qualquer jeito?/%

obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1104_0: * That chill I feel..^1. is..^1.&* Is this what politics feels like?/%

* (It's a chair.^1)&* (Maybe it's into politics.)/%
* (It's a painting of the town.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1081_0: * I'm sorry^1, I'm sorry^1.&* The mayor is busy right now./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1082_0: * If you need to see her^1, please try causing some terrible crisis./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1086_0: * I'm sorry^1, I'm sorry^1.&* Are you here to complain about your teacher?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1087_0: * If you don't like her^1, please blame your mother for getting her hired.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1068_0: * Hey^1 short-stuff^1.&* Why would YOU possibly need to talk to the mayor?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1069_0: * Your allowance too low^1?&* Ate too much candies^1?&* Lost your frisbee in the wash?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1071_0: * That's what the cops are for./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1074_0: * What^1? Don't talk to you like you're a "kid^1?" Fine.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1075_0: * If you need someone to change your diaper^1, go ask the Cop's./%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2150_0: * Kris..^1. What a pleasant surprise to see you here^1.&* And on a school day./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2151_0: * There must be a reason that you came here at such a time./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2152_0: * I^1, Father Alvin^1, implore you^1.&* If you have anything weighing on your mind^1, please^1, speak./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2159_0: * Kris, if you want some of our "sick" Fruit Juice^1, you should come to our service./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2160_0: * Our choir sounds a bit thinner since your brother went away./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2161_0: * Kris^1, it would be wonderful if you would sing with us./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2162_0: * Or even participated to any extent,/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2163_0: * Instead of just trying to drink the Fruit Juice./%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2167_0: * I understand^1.&* I hope in time you may find the words you seek./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2168_0: * Let the Angel's power light your way./%

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_718_0: "* Throughout my career^1, some of my best ideas came from dreams."/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_719_0: "* Take a rest here. If anyone asks -- you're writing!"/%
obj_npc_room_animated_slash_Other_10_gml: * ICE ME UP^1!&* ICE ME UP^1, BOSS!!!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1198_0: * So^1, for you two girls^1, that'll be the crepes^1, a cinnamon latte.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1199_0: * Two bunny parfaits, and... a piece of firewood...?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1202_0: * And^1, how would you like that firewood done?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1212_0: * Dude^1, remember when we used to skip the first hour of class to come here?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1213_0: * YOU were fine^1, but I almost had to repeat the year 'cause of it.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1214_0: * Those crepes were MAD worth^1, though^1! Delinquency is the best condiment!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1217_0: * Dude^1, if we didn't bring Gerson our leftovers^1, I bet I would have failed HARD.../%
obj_npc_room_animated_slash_Other_10_gml: * I like the vibe of the waitresses here^1.&* Maybe I should sign up^1, too.../
* ... Nah^1, serving drinks wouldn't really suit a fire elemental./
* If I got nervous^1, I'd just melt all the ice./%
* What if I just served coffee^1?&* Nah^1, that sounds like a lawsuit waiting to happen.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1237_0: * Ice Wolf does not like ice in drink./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1243_0: * Ice Wolf also like ice-themed mascots./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1226_0: * Looking at my rugged body^1, you must wonder what kind of secrets I hold.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1227_0: * My secret is^1, I put all my leftover pancakes in this giant hat./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1151_0: * Hey there^1!&* Haven't seen you in a while^1, hun./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1153_0: * I remember^1, back on Sundays^1, after service.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1154_0: * You and your family would come in and order the special./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1157_0: * But every Sunday^1, you and your brother'd still come in./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1158_0: * He'd order you a hot chocolate.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1159_0: * And you two'd sit down at that table in the corner.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1160_0: * ... drawin' shapes in the window with your breath./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1162_0: * You must really miss him^1, huh?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1172_0: * ... You know^1, I'd give you a hot chocolate on the house.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1173_0: * ... But it looks like you've got enough things already./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1145_0: * Don't be a stranger now^1, alright^1, hun?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1136_0: * Uh^1, we'll take the special^1, and do you have any edible glitter...?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1137_0: * The youngest one won't eat anything if it doesn't look like treasure.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1139_0: * In a pinch^1, sprinkles will work^1, too.../%

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_849_0: \M4* Feels like my self-esteem's in full bloom^1! Feels like my head's about to flower!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_850_0: \M2* Wait^1, what was the name^1?&* B..^1. Bootis^1? Yeah^1! Perfect^1!&* The taste^1, the smell^1, the.../
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_857_0: \M2* Asriel II..^1. Mmm..^1.&* Sounds..^1. familiar^1.&* It feels like..^1. a memory!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_858_0: \M4* It feels like that good boy..^1.&* That threw those good corn flakes in the water for me./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_859_0: \M2* Wait^1, what was the name^1?&* C..^1. Cereal^1? Yeah^1! I love Cereal^1! Bathe me in flakes!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_869_0: \M0* Thank you for giving me a name^1!&* I'll cherish it^1, y'hear!?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_871_0: \M2* K..^1. Krismas^1?&* That's your name^1, right?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_872_0: \M3* Um^1, H..^1. Hippa..^1. um..^1.&* Hyper Potato Mask^1.&* That's your name^1, right?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_873_0: \M1* I wanna tell you..^1. something..^1. tomorrow.../
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_874_0: \M5* Somethin' I can only tell a friend.../
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3033_0: \E0* Kris^1, honey^1, you have grown up so much.../
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3034_0: \E9* Someday soon you will be going off to university as well.../
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3037_0: \E8* You asked when your horns were going to grow in?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3038_0: \E0* So we bought that headband with the little red horns on it./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3039_0: \E4* Oh^1, you wore it for months! Whatever happened to it?/%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1572_0: \E2* Kris^1, I need to grade these assignments./
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1573_0: \E0* Perhaps you should go to bed...?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1574_0: \E1* You do not look very well.../%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2184_0: * (You dig out the marshmallow one and start huffing it.)/%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2188_0: * (The chocolate one smells too fake anyway.)/%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3141_0: * Marga riba^1!&* That cake^1!&* It's seething with power!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3142_0: * It's my cake^1, isn't it!^1?&* Did you repair it!^1?&* Will you return it!?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3151_0: * Edamame^1! My old cake^1! I'm so happy I could spin!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3152_0: * My friend^1, share in my riches^1! I have many worse cakes I do not want!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3153_0: * If you're not carrying a Cake^1, come here and I'll give you one^1! Forever!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3155_0: \S0* (You traded the TopCake for the SpinCake.)/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3156_0: * Now^1, I'm going to continue to spin and cry^1! Spin and cry!/%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3161_0: * Sweet in cake^1, but not in character^1! A tragedy!!/%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3173_0: * Mama miba^1! How are you enjoying my rejected pastries?/%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3177_0: * Mom amiga^1! You want an inferior cake^1, my friend?/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3186_0: * Please take this cake^1! It's worthless^1, my dear friend!/
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3191_0: * Mama shiba^1! You're carrying too many things that aren't cakes!/%
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3196_0: * I understand!^1! Too much cake will make you spin and cry!!/%
